name: WP PunchCard
author: Andrea Ercolino

sections.description:
Easy social bookmarking for WordPress with PunchCard (the bundled version is 1.4):

  1. PunchCard lets your readers submit your content to their social bookmarking sites with extreme simplicity
  2. PunchCard shrinks 40 target sites in a very little space, so that you save real estate of your pages
  3. PunchCard preserves the (40) target icons, while sharing a common minimal interface
  4. PunchCard is fully configurable: submitted content, target sites, shapes and colors
  5. You can add as many different PunchCards to your pages as you want
  6. As a gadget, your readers will get their cards punched where they clicked: it’s for recording that they already submitted that content to that target

Examples

  • <div class="pc_STRIP"><div class="punchcard">
    <object>
    <param name="punchcard" value='{
    title: "PunchCard is cool!"
    , url: "http://noteslog.com/punchcard/"
    , id : "PunchCard"
    }'/>
    </object>
    </div></div>
  • <div class="pc_MINI"><div class="punchcard">
    <object>
    <param name="punchcard" value='{
    title: "WP PunchCard is coolest!"
    , url: "http://noteslog.com/wp-punchcard/"
    , id : "WP PunchCard"
    }'/>
    </object>
    </div></div>

Tips

  • Use WP PunchCard with Enzymes to achieve greater flexibility

Supported Sites

  1. Backflip
  2. BlinkBits
  3. Blinklist
  4. blogmarks
  5. Buddymarks
  6. CiteUlike
  7. del.icio.us
  8. Diigo
  9. digg
  10. dzone
  11. FeedMarker
  12. Feed Me Links!
  13. Furl
  14. Give a Link
  15. Gravee
  16. Hyperlinkomatic
  17. igooi
  18. kinja
  19. Lilisto
  20. Linkagogo
  21. Linkroll
  22. Magnolia
  23. maple
  24. Netscape
  25. netvouz
  26. Newsvine
  27. reddit
  28. Rojo
  29. Segnalo
  30. Simpy
  31. Spurl
  32. Squidoo
  33. tagtooga
  34. Tailrank
  35. Technorati
  36. unalog
  37. Wink
  38. wists
  39. Yahoo My Web
  40. zurpy
sections.installation:
1. Copy the wp-punchcard folder into your plugins folder
  2. Activate WP PunchCard
